originalText.text: Dr. Roytberg is not just an amazing dentist, but a genuinely nice person that always greets you with a warm smile. The entire staff is warm and friendly and each visit is always extremely pleasant. Not to mention that he knows his stuff, and is extremely thorough when caring for your pearly whites. I dreaded my very first visit to the dentist, but having been a loyal patient for the last few years, I actually look forward to going to the dentist knowing that I’m in great hands. I highly recommend him!

originalText.text: Dr. Roytberg is excellent: Thorough, kind, gentle (over 10 years of seeing him, he has given me 3 fillings and they never hurt at all--in fact, he completely fixed the tooth pain I was having before I went to see him). The front desk staff is courteous and always gets me in right on time. The hygienist is thorough and friendly. No concerns whatsoever.

text.text: Dr. Roytberg is excellent: Thorough, kind, gentle (over 10 years of seeing him, he has given me 3 fillings and they never hurt at all--in fact, he completely fixed the tooth pain I was having before I went to see him). The front desk staff is courteous and always gets me in right on time. The hygienist is thorough and friendly. No concerns whatsoever.

originalText.text: Dr. Roytberg and Tina are fantastic. Excellent care, expertise, demeanor, and the bonus of flexible hours and sympathy made me decide to become a regular patient. All the procedures were painless and perfect, Dr. Roytberg is very thorough and, and unlike past dentist experiences, he doesn't suggest unnecessary dental work. I really appreciate the care, attention and professionalism, and highly recommend him.

text.text: Dr. Roytberg and Tina are fantastic. Excellent care, expertise, demeanor, and the bonus of flexible hours and sympathy made me decide to become a regular patient. All the procedures were painless and perfect, Dr. Roytberg is very thorough and, and unlike past dentist experiences, he doesn't suggest unnecessary dental work. I really appreciate the care, attention and professionalism, and highly recommend him.

originalText.text: Dr. Roytberg is literally the best Dentist I have ever had. Many providers are focused on how to get the most $$ out of their patients, Dr. Roytberg's first priority is the health and well being of his patients! Recently moved out of state and still travel back to NYC for my dental needs -- he's THAT good and worth it. Can't leave a review without mentioning his staff as well, especially Tina. She's an angel and goes above and beyond without hesitation -- thank you SO very much for all that you do!!! x

originalText.text: Worst and most careless, sloppy dentist ever. Ruined my crowns. Scratched crown. Reshaped crown without telling me. Leaves product all over mouth. Rude. Short tempered. Gross office. Run far and fast. He is the worst!! He has zero attention to detail. Gets huffy if you have a question. Atrocious!
